ingredients.content: 500 - 600 g tinned butter beans, rinsed and drained

preparations.content: Place a large serving bowl on mixing bowl lid and weigh in butter beans then set bowl aside.

Place red peppers, green peppers, onions, olives, oil, vinegar and salt in mixing bowl then chop <b>6-8 sec/speed 4<b>. Add to beans in serving bowl and stir with spatula. Serve or refrigerate until required.
